title: Colgate 360 Optic White Sonic Power Toothbrush, Full Head Medium (Pack of 12)
features: The polishing bristles and stain erasing cups work their magic by polishing away surface stains for a white smile you'll want to flash

description: Want results? Count on this powerful toothbrush for a beautiful, radiant, white smile! With its dual-action head, you can now get a brush that both polishes and shines your teeth, while getting the clean you expect from a vibrating toothbrush.
